text: Mirko Ivančić (born 5 June 1960) is a Croatian rower. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Yugoslavia Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Split, Croatia
title: Mirko Ivančić
